segments.text: Can you ship this batch of cotton within five or six weeks ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What kind of cottons are they ? May I see your list ? Ah , machine prints .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , mainly prints . There are a few plain as well . Here they are .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . And the quantities .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: 200 rolls of each . Make it 200 rolls for each sample .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How many rolls altogether ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Twenty prints and five plain . That makes 5,000 rolls in all .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Six weeks , did you say ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , five to six weeks .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We could manage the plain rolls in six weeks . The prints might be put off to eight weeks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Eight weeks ? We can wait that long .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's the best we can do just now , I'm afraid .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can't you make it seven weeks for the prints ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What about taking the prints in two shipments ? Two thousand rolls in seven weeks , and the remained a week later .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That might be acceptable . I shall have to cable our Beijing office to get their approval . You can definitely supply in the time you've given me , I suppose .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I'll see that you get those delivery . Shipping by ' S . S . American ' as usual , is that all right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's right .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When can we expect your confirmation of the order ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: As soon as I hear from Beijing , that will be either Friday or Saturday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right .
segments.speaker: S2
